blogPost.excerpt: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
blogPost.body: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
blogPost.title: PlutoPDF - A URL to PDF converter wrapped behind a simple API.
blogPost.author: Scott Walker

localize.description: 从一个URL生成一个PDF。简单、快捷、方便。这背后的想法很简单。不要把您的开发时间花在构建复杂的PDF基础架构上。让我们用一个简单的、异步的API来处理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一个包裹在一个简单的API后面的URL到PDF转换器。

localize.description: 從一個URL生成一個PDF。簡單、快捷、方便。這背後的想法很簡單。不要把您的開發時間花在構建複雜的PDF基礎架構上。讓我們用一個簡單的、異步的API來處理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一個包裹在一個簡單的API後面的URL到PDF轉換器。

previous.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
previous.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute

localize.description: 大家都在说同一种语言--可视化🌅。所以，让你的后台--可视化! 在浏览器中画出你的后端架构和代码，并在同一白板上执行。忘记日志或猜测你的代码做什么。实时查看😍
localize.tagline: 可视化软件开发生态系统。绘制+代码+执行

localize.description: 大家都在說同一種語言--可視化🌅。所以，讓你的後臺--可視化! 在瀏覽器中畫出你的後端架構和代碼，並在同一白板上執行。忘記日誌或猜測你的代碼做什麼。實時查看😍
localize.tagline: 可視化軟件開發生態系統。繪製+代碼+執行

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 25 days in a row, down 48k from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/OsPHrvvtDw

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续25天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了4.8万。🙏 https://t.co/OsPHrvvtDw。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續25天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了4.8萬。🙏 https://t.co/OsPHrvvtDw。
